程序包 com.example.a301groupproject.ui.home

类 HomeFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.a301groupproject.ui.home.HomeFragment
所有已实现的接口:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, RvInterface
public class HomeFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment implements RvInterface
HomeFragment is the main UI controller that users interact with for listing, deleting, and managing items. It hosts a RecyclerView to display the list of items and integrates with HomeViewModel for data handling. This fragment allows users to perform actions such as delete and view item details, with changes observed in real-time.

  • 方法详细资料

    • onCreateView

      public android.view.View onCreateView(@NonNull android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, android.view.ViewGroup container, android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Called to have the fragment instantiate its user interface view. This method inflates the layout for the fragment's view and initializes RecyclerView with an adapter.
      覆盖:
      onCreateView 在类中 androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      参数:
      inflater - LayoutInflater object to inflate views in the fragment
      container - Parent view that the fragment's UI should be attached to
      savedInstanceState - If non-null, this fragment is being reconstructed from a previous saved state
      返回:
      The root View for the fragment's UI, or null

    • onDestroyView

      public void onDestroyView()
      Called when the view hierarchy associated with the fragment is being removed. This ensures the binding is cleaned up to prevent memory leaks.
      覆盖:
      onDestroyView 在类中 androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

    • onItemClick

      public void onItemClick(int position)
      Handles item click events by logging the clicked position and navigating to the item addition screen with the item's position passed as an argument for potential editing.
      指定者:
      onItemClick 在接口中 RvInterface
      参数:
      position - The position of the clicked item in the RecyclerView.
